mapper.insert: /* 푸시 메시지 발송내역 등록 */ INSERT INTO CM_WEB_MSG ( WEB_REQ_ID, CORP_ID, PROJECT_ID, API_KEY, CH_GRP, CH, MSG_INFO, CU_INFO, SENDER_CNT, CALLBACK, CAMPAIGN_ID, SENDER_TYPE, STATUS, GW_RESULT_CODE, GW_RESULT_DESC, RESV_SENDER_YN, REG_DT, REQ_DT, ) VALUES ( #{webReqId}, #{corpId}, #{projectId}, #{apiKey}, #{chGrp}, #{ch}, #{msgInfo}, #{cuInfo}, #{senderCnt}, #{callback}, #{campaignId}, #{senderType}, #{status}, #{gwResultCode}, #{gwResultDesc}, #{resvSenderYn}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
